duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct all aspects of acquisitions, including sourcing, underwriting, fundraising, and dispositions within the Dallas-Fort Worth MSA.
Source and structure deals, identify investors, and lead transactions.
Oversee market research and site sourcing for acquisition opportunities. Manage analysis, underwriting, and make investment recommendations to internal investment committee.

Manage all due diligence, feasibility, and acquisition processes. Lead the creation of financial models, feasibility studies, due diligence, market analysis and related underwriting for potential property acquisitions.
Work with Founders and Investment Principal(s) to structure, secure, and manage debt and equity relationships for new acquisitions. Oversee investor communication and reporting for acquired projects.
Work with Asset Management team for the execution of business plans, ensuring optimization of assets and portfolio.
Negotiate all documents associated with the acquisition capital stack.
Create proposals, presentations, and financial reports for all real estate opportunities.
Partner with internal teams for client and investor meetings.
Drive enhancements and improvements in processes, procedures and use of systems to create operational efficiencies.
Cultivate strong relationships with external commercial brokers and prospective property sellers to gain access to off-market transactions as they become available.
Be involved in all aspects of the real estate transaction process.
Proxy for capital raising team at internal meetings and on conference calls.
Reports to Investments Principal(s) and Founders.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA in Real Estate, Finance, or related field required
